= Artifact

The following artifacts are uploaded.

|===
| artifact name
| description
| path(s)

a|
----
${{ inputs.compiled-classes-artifact-name }}
----
| all compiled classes
a|

----

a|

| the maven state for incremental builds
a|

----
|===

All artifacts are deleted after `${{ inputs.artifact-retention-days }}`.
